itunes:title: My Son Is Saying the F-Word
title: My Son Is Saying the F-Word
itunes:author: JLML Press
itunes:subtitle: A mother writes that her “kind, sensitive” boy ha…
itunes:summary:
A mother writes that her “kind, sensitive” boy has picked up the F-word and is using it frequently to test his parents’ patience. She says that she has tried a variety of responses, ranging from ignoring the word to disallowing it, but nothing has helped. Both parents are out of ideas and looking for some direction. 

For more advice on parenting issues, please check out this new audio resource -- "Sessions" -- my recorded consultations with parents: SessionsAudio.com
